description: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) uses [Prestige](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1058) to disable and restore file system redirection by using the following functions:  `Wow64DisableWow64FsRedirection()` and `Wow64RevertWow64FsRedirection()`.(Citation: Microsoft Prestige ransomware October 2022)

external_references.description: MSTIC. (2022, October 14). New “Prestige” ransomware impacts organizations in Ukraine and Poland. Retrieved January 19, 2023.
